lines.text: Yeah, man. It's only been staring us in the face for the past... however long.
That hologram, man. It's a <c#=0000FF>Living Memory</c> spell- an image of something the caster remembers.
Unless the Stop Wizard got tricked into seeing someone fire a gun who didn't...
We've got as good as photographic evidence that Slick Emmup fired a gun at the Go Wizard.
It's only as accurate as his memories, though...
From the looks of that statue- and his buddy over there- we're lookin' at someone who's gettin' on in years.
You sure it's not just some sorta... weaponized senility, here?
That kind of falls under him being tricked, though. Isn't it simpler to assume it just worked the way it says it works?
It's just- y'know, our workin' theory is that the wizards covered up the real cause of death- a bullet wound.
If you're so sure Slick fired the gun, then... how in Sam Hill did he die from it?
Oh, don't worry about that. I think I've got that one figured out.
I think there's one piece of evidence that'll... <c=#FF00FF>turn things around,</c> heh heh.
